SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.listeners

Class ModelSubject

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.listeners.ModelSubject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Game, Player
public class ModelSubject extends Object
The ModelSubject class is used as a means to send notifications with information about the state of a game (connections/disconnections, choices made, objectives reached, etc.). It also adds or removes client listeners through two methods (addListener/deleteListeners)

      Updates the MatchLog with the client and all the choices made
      Parameters:
      o - the client making the choices
      coords - the item's coordinates chosen
      column - the shelf's column choice
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the execution of update method call goes wrong
